attributes.action: BAN property licencing for landlords why pay to licence ur own home who benefits?
attributes.additional_details: Landlords are forced to purchase property licences!  Why do we have to pay £500+ to licence our own property if the government/borough wants to introduce licencing it should be available for FREE, landlords have to find a reliable tenant pay for any repairs make sure everything is in good working order or face a hefty fine!  Now purchase a licence for your own property to show who?  no-one pays the landlord for the damages we deal with tenants not the borough not the government this is a con and easy money for the local council stop this daylight robbery we are the victims
